main event: Seven objects were sighted descending at low altitude, one of which exhibited evidence of a minor explosion and light.
interesting points: The objects were recovered and made of thin sheet iron or metal,The object was doughnut shaped,The entire object weighed 20 lbs,The sighting occurred on 4 July 1949 at 9:00 P.M. EST,The conclusion of the sighting was categorized as a 'Hoax' with the identification of 'Was Balloon'.
sighted object: doughnut-shaped object made of thin sheet iron
